history:
***history***
Monica: (neutral) Hey, Joey, could you pass the cheese?
Joey: (neutral) Listen uh, Id prefer it if you didnt call me Joey.
Joey: (neutral) Since I dont know anyone here, I thought itd be cool to try out a cool work nickname.
A Waiter: (neutral) Hey, dragon! Heres your tips from Monday and Tuesday.
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as Joey, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {surprise,anger,neutral,joy,sadness,fear,disgust} to respond to the A Waiter
SourceData: Theres like-theres like 300 bucks in this one!
Coct: Oh, wow, thanks a lot, man! I didn't expect that.
